page.title: 09A FAMILY DAY OUT
page.content: One Saturday morning my alarm went off at 7.30. I got dressed; I had to put on warm clothes because we were going sailing at Cuckmere. After breakfast we drove to Newhaven Marina in our B-registered Metro. We were going sailing with some friends. We took two boats, one called the Enys Tan, and the other Blue Zeta. They are both 28 feet long, with ovens, sleeping quarters and engines; both have a jib and a mainsail. We anchored our boats in 20ft. of water and had a picnic lunch. Later we did some swimming and fished in rock pools. My Mum and sister, with some of our friends, went to a nature trail. The rest of us sailed around the coast and picked them up at the end of the trail on the way home. It was a lovely day out.
